name: Branch Buds: Leafing Planet Earth
description:
Made for a 48-hour game jam.

Our brave sloth friend has some big aspirations: to reach the moon! Plant seeds, grow plants and reach for the stars! Just be careful not to fall. Can you break the atmosphere and become the worlds first cosmosloth?

Developed by: 
Christian Nava: https://twitter.com/Chryis13
Conor Kou: https://twitter.com/conorkou
Evan Polekoff: https://twitter.com/epolekoff
Tiffany Chiu: https://twitter.com/tiffachiu
